resources.string: You have recently downloaded/updated secrecy. This wizard is to help you manage version changes.
\nVault structure updated from version 1 to version 2

This app is still in alpha stage, meaning many functions are still inexistent or incomplete.
Please do not judge it against other fully-functional product. If you find any problem, please leave a comment in Play Store so that we can follow up.
Please don\'t just leave a low rating, which can\'t help us find the problem and enhance it. Thank you!
